readingMnemonic: The aforementioned <kanji>void</kanji> has opened up in Little <reading>Kyo</reading>to (きょ). The spiked void tigers chose to come here in order to face off against the Hanshin Tigers baseball team in battle. It will be a vicious match here in Little Kyoto. Since this is taking place in Little Kyoto and not Japan itself, the Hanshin Tigers won't have the home field advantage. Who will win?
meaningMnemonic: A <radical>tiger</radical>, clad in <radical>spikes</radical>, exists in the <kanji>void</kanji>. This tiger is from another dimension where tigers rule the earth, clad in armor with spikes. The void has allowed this tiger to cross dimensional planes.
